name: gda-dashboard
description: The Governance Data Alliance is a group of NGOs, governments, firms, and donors who are working to improve the quality, availability, breadth, and use of governance data.

scripts.start: bundle exec jekyll serve & ./node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js js/main.js -o js/bundle.js
scripts.build: bundle exec jekyll build & ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js js/main.js -o js/bundle.js
scripts.test: cd js/test && python -m SimpleHTTPServer 1337 & ./node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js js/test/spec/* -o js/test/bundle.js

author: Vizzuality
